summary.span: 将一种基元类型的只读范围强制转换为另一种基元类型的只读范围。

span.span: Casts a read-only span of one primitive type to a read-only span of another primitive type.

returns.span: 转换后的只读范围。

span.span: The converted read-only span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 既不`TFrom`也不`TTo`可以包含指针或引用。Neither `TFrom` nor `TTo` can contain pointers or references. `TFrom` 和`TTo`要在运行时检查以保持类型安全性。`TFrom` and `TTo` are checked at runtime in order to preserve type safety. 仅在支持未对齐的内存访问的平台上支持此方法或内存的阻止时通过其他方式对齐。This method is supported only on platforms that support misaligned memory access or when the memory block is aligned by other means.

exception.span: 或 包含引用或指针。

span.span: or contains references or pointers.

summary.span: 将一种基元类型的范围强制转换为另一种基元类型的范围。

span.span: Casts a span of one primitive type to a span of another primitive type.

returns.span: 转换后的范围。

span.span: The converted span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 既不`TFrom`也不`TTo`可以包含指针或引用。Neither `TFrom` nor `TTo` can contain pointers or references. `TFrom` 和`TTo`要在运行时检查以保持类型安全性。`TFrom` and `TTo` are checked at runtime in order to preserve type safety. 强制转换发生在未检查的上下文中。The cast occurs in an unchecked context. 如果范围`TTo`小于的范围`TFrom`，会发生数据丢失。If the range of `TTo` is less than the range of `TFrom`, data loss can occur. 例如，如果`TFrom`是、 利用某个的`ReadOnlySpan`值是 0x100001111110F0F，和`TTo`是，生成的值是 11110F0F。For example, if `TFrom` is , one of the `ReadOnlySpan` values is 0x100001111110F0F, and `TTo` is , the resulting value is 11110F0F. 仅在支持未对齐的内存访问的平台上支持此方法或内存的阻止时通过其他方式对齐。This method is supported only on platforms that support misaligned memory access or when the memory block is aligned by other means.

exception.span: 或 包含引用或指针。

span.span: or contains references or pointers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用此方法，且该数组不能已取消固定时，必须已固定数组它将返回的缓冲区是仍在使用。The array must already be pinned before this method is called, and that array must not be unpinned while the buffer that it returns is still in use. 已取消固定数组上调用此方法可能导致内存损坏。Calling this method on an unpinned array could result in memory corruption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会很有用，如果托管对象的一部分表示固定的数组。This method can be useful if part of a managed object represents a fixed array. > [!WARNING] > 应谨慎使用此方法。This method should be used with caution. 这非常危险，因为`length`不检查自变量。It is dangerous because the `length` argument is not checked. 此外，返回跨度的生存期不验证为安全起见识别跨度的语言。In addition, the lifetime of the returned span is not validated for safety by span-aware languages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果只读的范围为空，则此方法返回对其中索引 0 处的元素将存储的位置的引用。If the read-only span is empty, this method returns a reference to the location where the element at index 0 would have been stored. 此类引用可能会或可能不是`null`。Such a reference may or may not be `null`. 返回的引用可以用于固定，但它必须永远不会被取消引用。The returned reference can be used for pinning, but it must never be dereferenced.
